description: Experience the freshness of Mexico with our Guacamole Fresco served alongside crispy homemade tortilla chips. Mashed avocados, diced tomatoes, onions, cilantro, and a squeeze of lime come together to create a creamy and zesty dip that's bursting with flavor. Pair it with our crunchy tortilla chips for the ultimate appetizer sensation.
title: Guacamole Fresco with Homemade Tortilla Chips

description: Dive into a bowl of traditional Mexican comfort with our Sopa de Tortilla. Rich, savory broth infused with roasted tomatoes, onions, garlic, and spices, filled with tender shredded chicken, crispy tortilla strips, creamy avocado, and tangy lime. This soul-warming soup is a fiesta of flavors that will transport you straight to the heart of Mexico.
title: Sopa de Tortilla
